# More JSON Practice: Nobel Prize

## Load Libraries
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(RCurl)
library(jsonlite)
library(purrr)
```

## Import JSON
The data we'll be using is about the Nobel Prize Laureates found on 
<br>
https://api.nobelprize.org/2.1/laureates
<br>
<br>
This endpoint is further nested in https://www.nobelprize.org/about/developer-zone-2/

```{r}
laureates_json <- getURL("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ryungje/DATA607/refs/heads/main/Assignment%2010/Assignment%2010B/laureates.json") %>%
  fromJSON("laureates.json")
```

## Tidy JSON

```{r}
laureates <- laureates_json$laureates %>%
  map_dfr(function(laureate) {
  tibble(
    name = laureate$fullName$en,
    country = laureate$birth$place$country$en,
    gender = laureate$gender,
    birthday = laureate$birth$date,
    nobel.prizes = laureate$nobelPrizes
  )
})
```
